amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting renewable energy projects receiving Federal funds and subsidies from purchasing materials, technology, and critical minerals produced in China.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3627 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 9. Record Vote Number: 337.

action.text: Amendment SA 3627 proposed by Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S6223; text: CR S6223) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting renewable energy projects receiving Federal funds and subsidies from purchasing materials, technology, and critical minerals produced in China.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3627 proposed by Senator Sullivan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3627 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 9. Record Vote Number: 337.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3627 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 9. Record Vote Number: 337.
